#summary Languages TradeLink supports for Trading

TradeLink is open source and fully .net CLI compliant.

This means you can program in any .net language with TradeLink.

This includes many, many languages, such as:
 * c# (c sharp)
 * visual basic (vb)
 * f#
 * managed c++
 * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_CLI_languages pascal, python, java and many others]
